name: Another Memories
overview: Another Memories is a dating simulation game in which the player controls a young magician apprentice that is on the magic school and he will encounter diiferent girls meanwhile he is trying to graduate. In the game the player will have to choose what to do each day: He can train his character to improve his stats and make him more expert using magic, or he can go around the school and other places to talk to different characters or gain the girls friendship. As in most of the dating games there are parts of the games with other events like mini games and there are also some battle sequences in which the player have to defeat different enemies using different cards to make the different attacks and advance in the game. The game uses the first person perspective for the adventure part and the third person perspective for the events and battles. The game features beautiful 2d graphics and japanese voices.
